channel.title: Need Some help please
channel.description:
i need a commands only for admins+ the commands is example :
::resetatt (here player name) (xp i need to reset to him)
another example :
::resetatt amer 15000
any help please ?

item.title: Need Some help please
item.dc:creator: @ameer122 ameer122
item.description:
@ameer122 wrote:

i have small error

i add those

if (command.startsWith("resetatt") && playerRights >= 2) { String player = command.substring(9); int ID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if (ID != -1 && player != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID]; p.playerLevel[0] = 1; p.playerXP[0] = 1; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; p.getTotalLevel(); p.refreshSkills(); p.sM(playerName + " reset your strength to 1."); sM("You reset " + p.playerName + "'s attack to 1."); } } if (command.startsWith("resetstr") && playerRights >= 2) { String player = command.substring(9); int ID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if (ID != -1 && player != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID]; p.playerLevel[2] = 1; p.playerXP[2] = 1; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; p.getTotalLevel(); p.refreshSkills(); p.sM(playerName +" reset your strength to 1."); sM("You reset " + p.playerName + "'s strength to 1."); } } if (command.startsWith("resetdef") && playerRights >= 2) { String player = command.substring(9); int ID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if (ID != -1 && player != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID]; p.playerLevel[1] = 1; p.playerXP[1] = 1; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; p.getTotalLevel(); p.refreshSkills(); p.sM(playerName +" reset your Defence to 1."); sM("You reset " + p.playerName + "'s Defence to 1."); } } if (command.startsWith("resethp") && playerRights >= 2) { String player = command.substring(9); int ID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if (ID != -1 && player != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID]; p.playerLevel[3] = 1; p.playerXP[3] = 1; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; p.getTotalLevel(); p.refreshSkills(); p.sM(playerName +" reset your Hitpoint to 1."); sM("You reset " + p.playerName + "'s Hitpoint to 1."); } } if (command.startsWith("resetrange") && playerRights >= 2) { String player = command.substring(9); int ID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if (ID != -1 && player != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID]; p.playerLevel[4] = 1; p.playerXP[4] = 1; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; p.getTotalLevel(); p.refreshSkills(); p.sM(playerName +" reset your Range to 1."); sM("You reset " + p.playerName + "'s Range to 1."); } } if (command.startsWith("resetmagi") && playerRights >= 2) { String player = command.substring(9); int ID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if (ID != -1 && player != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID]; p.playerLevel[6] = 1; p.playerXP[6] = 1; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; p.getTotalLevel(); p.refreshSkills(); p.sM(playerName +" reset your Magic to 1."); sM("You reset " + p.playerName + "'s Magic to 1."); } } if (command.startsWith("resetprayer") && playerRights >= 2) { String player = command.substring(9); int ID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if (ID != -1 && player != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID]; p.playerLevel[5] = 1; p.playerXP[5] = 1; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; p.getTotalLevel(); p.refreshSkills(); p.sM(playerName +" reset your Prayer to 1."); sM("You reset " + p.playerName + "'s Prayer to 1."); } }

but only
::resetatt
::resetstr
::resetdef

work

another won’t work any help?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Some help please
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

[quote=“ameer122, post:7, topic:357970”]word life or dastan best friends

what i have to change ? to make it work with any skill i need it[/quote]
See this

p.playerLevel[0]

That [0] is the skill value for attack
Here’s a list of all the skill values
0 - Attack
1 - Defence
2 - Strength
3 - Hitpoints
4 - Ranged
5 - Prayer
6 - Magic
7 - Cooking
8 - Woodcutting
9 - Fletching
10 - Fishing
11 - Firemaking
12 - Crafting
13 - Smithing
14 - Mining
15 - Herblore
16 - Agility
17 - Thieving
18 - Slayer
19 - Farming
20 - Runecrafting

Read full topic

item.title: Need Some help please
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

just change these

p.playerLevel[0] = 1; p.playerXP[0] = 1;
The

Level[0]

is your skill ID

The

= 1

is level that you want to be knocked down to

The

XP[0] = 1

is the xp you want to be reseted to. JUST EDIT THE NUMBER “1”

Egzample.

p.playerLevel[18] = 1; p.playerXP[0] = 5;
means that my slayer lvl will go down to 1 and 5 xp

Read full topic
